text:
@WhiteHouse @Mike_Pence BS!!!!!! 6-7 weeks of TOTAL INACTION 
by #IMPOTUS and you has sentenced 
millions of Americans to contract COVID-19 
and caused 10's of thousands of Americans 
to die alone and without their loved ones near them.

I am so sick of this administration. #FlushTheTurdsOnNovemberThird
